column3: Checked it's the same key used for the gitian signatures pull.\nBTW: mind uploading this to a keyserver as well? I was unable to fetch it from there by id.
Yep, done (e.g. [MIT keyserver](https://pgp.mit.edu/pks/lookup?op=get&search=0xD300116E1C875A3D)) :) It's also on keybase here: https://keybase.io/meshcollider
